actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to assist in the preservation of historic Camden in the State of South Carolina, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into cooperative agreements with public and private nonprofit entities pursuant to which the Secretary may assist in the protection, restoration, and interpretation of historic Camden, South Carolina.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to assist in the preservation of historic Camden in the State of South Carolina, and for other purposes.
